title: Login Status Loading
body:
anyone have loging issues?

Login Status Loading......

replies.body: Not seeing anything here.  If you're stuck at loading then your network might be having issues reaching the authentication server.  I'll keep an eye out just in case, but in the meantime I recommend going over the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot and login.
